docker-compose.yml

volumes:
  sentry-data:
    external: true
  sentry-postgres:
    external: true
  sentry-redis:
    external: true
  sentry-zookeeper:
    external: true
  sentry-kafka:
    external: true
  sentry-clickhouse:
    external: true
  sentry-symbolicator:
    external: true
